project_descr: Feasibility study for the remediation of the Bor mine surface and groundwaters

outputs.output_descr: The project focus is to prepare a feasibility study for selected sites in the Bor mine complex that both serve to determine requirements for environmental remediation of pollution sources to water and also introduce a socio-political perspective. It is intended to achieve recommendation and study outcomes that introduce a community participatory approach to remediation of environmental hot spots that in the absence of remediation measures could constitute a trigger for national or transnational tensions.
